text: tatha (yaad karo) jab moosa ne apanee jaati se kahaah apane oopar allaah ke puraskaar ko yaad karo, jab usane tumhen firauniyon se mukt kiya, jo tumhen ghor yaatana de rahe the, tumhaare putron ko vadh kar rahe the aur tumhaaree striyon ko jeevit rahane dete[1] the aur isamen tumhaare paralanahaar kee or se ek mahaan pareeksha thee
